title: Flower Holder, 1889
provenance: A present for the tenth wedding anniversary of Mr. and Mrs. George T. Bliss, February 12, 1889.
description: Flowers and leaves of stamped metal. Twelve leaves soldered to flaring circular stems surround three smaller leaves and twenty-five flowers mounted on wire stems rising from a common base. Topmost flower, center, has five large petals enclosing blossom in three layers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Flower Holder, 1889.
1889. Tin. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1937-45-1-a,b.
